text: you're stranded in the woods alone the
Sun is going down and you need to start
a fire quickly before it gets too cold
what do you do in extremely desperate
situations using your phone's battery as
a fire starter is a great technique but
just note lithium ion fires are
extremely dangerous and toxic this
technique should only be used as a last
resort there are two different ways to
do this after you've tried the battery
first try to create a spark if your
battery still has energy levels take a
conductive object with a rubber handle
like a knife and touchable for positive
and negative ends of the battery with
the blade to create sparks for your fire
but if the battery is completely dead
place it in the kindling and quickly
pierce the battery with a sharp object
this will short the battery causing
extreme temperatures that will ignite
the flammable materials inside but as
you do this make sure to cover your nose
and mouth with cloth and fumes coming
out of the battery Itachi
